people_also_ask.question: Is SimCity free to play?
people_also_ask.heading: The city-building game is currently available completely free of charge through EA's Origin digital store, thought it's not clear how long the deal will be on, so you'll probably want to grab it soon.10-Dec-2014
people_also_ask.title: SimCity 2000 is free right now - The Verge

people_also_ask.question: Why is SimCity dead?
people_also_ask.heading: The plans for improving the game were scrapped, meaning that aspects such as city sizes and improved multiplayer features would not be worked on. In the end, SimCity was never able to achieve the vision EA planned for it.04-Feb-2020
